Title: Replay: Modernizing Legacy: COBOL to Cloud with GitHub Copilot
Description:
Join us for a replay live stream with Julia Kordick, Software Global Black Belt at Microsoft, as she demonstrates how AI-assisted tools like GitHub Copilot and autonomous agents are transforming large-scale COBOL modernization. Julia will showcase a live demo of migrating legacy COBOL, covering reverse engineering, automated documentation, test generation, and code transformation.

Project repo: https://github.com/Azure-Samples/Legacy-Modernization-Agents Follow Julia: https://www.linkedin.com/in/julia-kordick/ Connect with Andrea: https://x.com/ALAColombiaDev
Author: GitHub
